body: Even if you suffer a grievous wound, you can shrug off the damage and continue your relentless assault.
name: Deathless Master

sections.body: Str 13, Con 15, Deathless Initiate, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide, base attack bonus +9, orc or half-orc.
